CustomField.description: Which group(s) to share with. API Name of the field whose value(s) match public group name(s). For example, Share_With__c.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specify an API Name of the Item, Change, Quality, or Mfr Part field whose values match public group names to share with. When sharing with Mfrs or Distributors, optionally enter an Account field API Name whose value will match the public group name to share with. For example, Share_With__c.
CustomField.label: Share With Field
